messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Geodesic dome
messages.msgSnippet: ... with ... If you re doing it for a conference, I ll assume you ve actually done it. The first time we tried it, we followed the directions and used staples.
messages.messageBody:
>
> << like when I organized the building of a geodesic dome out of newpapers
with
> our local group. >>
>
> Oooh, ooh, ooh! I'm doing those in my workshop at the conference! Fun.

If you're doing it for a conference, I'll assume you've actually done it.
The first time we tried it, we followed the directions and used staples.
They didn't work well. The second time we used masking tape, and it worked.
(At least that's the way I remember it. At any rate, one worked well and
the other one badly.
Tia
